attributes.action: Make Bradley Road, Winchester, SO22 6LG a saver road for children
attributes.additional_details: Steve Brine and Hampshire County Council can improve the safety of this road through the right measures. This is an attempt to bring awareness of this matter and get as many people involved who are aware of this issue.
attributes.background: Bradley Road is a very dangerous road! Unfortunately cars drive with high speed down the hill without any consideration for children crossing the road when accessing the playground! This needs to be changed. Please sign the petition

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

http://www3.hants.gov.uk/haveyoursay/petitions.htm
